Module org.uclouvain.visualsearchtree
Package org.uclouvain.visualsearchtree.bridge

Class Decoder

java.lang.Object
org.uclouvain.visualsearchtree.bridge.Decoder
public class Decoder extends Object
Note: This class helps to decode all data received through socket in order to draw a tree node on screen

  • Method Details

    • addToBuffer

      public static void addToBuffer(List<Byte> buffer, byte[] incomingBytes)
      Note: This method retrieve incoming data and insert it to server buffer based on our server-socket protocol. This help to draw node on Tree as data come. This is one of core function of server realtime functionality
      Parameters:
      buffer - List of Bytes
      incomingBytes - Bytes to add

    • deserialize

      public static Decoder.DecodedMessage deserialize(List<Byte> buffer, int msgSize)
      Note: Convert socket plain data from array byte to DecodedMessage
      Parameters:
      buffer - List of Bytes
      msgSize - Size of message to decode
      Returns:
      DecodedMessage object

    • readBuffer

      public static boolean readBuffer(byte[] b, List<Byte> buffer, int len)
      Note: Read data in server buffer
      Parameters:
      b - List of Bytes in which the removed bytes will be added
      buffer - List of Bytes in which bytes will be removed
      len - size of Bytes to remove
      Returns:
      boolean

    • byteArrayToInt

      public static int byteArrayToInt(byte[] bytes, String endian)
      Note: Help function. Convert byte Array ti Int. It helps to encode minicp-socket communication protocol
      Parameters:
      bytes - List of Bytes
      endian - string
      Returns:
      int

      public static Tree treeBuilder(List<Decoder.DecodedMessage> decodedMessageList)
      Note: build tree from decoded messages
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Note: Nodes types
      Parameters:
